page.title: 16CUSTOM RELIGION A BRIDESMAID
page.content: One of th days in my life which was very enjoyable was when I was a bridesmaid at my cousin's wedding. Early in the morning I went to the hair dressers and had my hair cut. Then I went to my cousin's house and got cleaned up then when the time got near I put my bridesmaid dress on and my veil. I was really scared when the time came to go to the church. The car arrived late and my cousin Judy had to wait for the car to arrive. When we arrived at the church I saw Ross standing in the aisle and then the music started playing and the other bridesmaid Joyce had to hold Judy's dress and we walked slowly up the aisle. Then the priest wedded them. After that we went to the reception and that was really good.
